name: Kurenai
text: My vacuum blades tear all to shreds... Whirlwind!
*Woooooooossshhh!!!*
The twin blades in Kurenai's hands created vortexes of air so strong they seemed to form a vacuum, which then tore through the thugs who had tried to leap at her.

name: Gangsters
text: "Uargh!!" "Wh-What is that!? Arghyaaaaaaahhh!!!"

name: Mari
text: (Uwahwah!? Amazing!! S-So that's Kurenai-san's Ninja Artー)
Before Mari's astonished eyes, the gangsters collapsed to the ground one after another.

name: Kurenai
text: You don't stand a chance. Stay out of this unless you want to end up like that.
Kurenai pointed at a nearby steel pillar.
A diagonal line suddenly streaked across its surface, and the next moment, the top half began to slowly slide off with an eerie sound as metal creaked against metal.

name: Gangsters
text: Eeeeeeeeeeeeehhkk!!? Th-This bitch is a monster!!
Having completely lost their morale, the gangsters scrambled to flee.

name: Kurenai
text: Hmph, a monster...? What a thing to say...
Kurenai laughed at herself and lowered her swords.

name: Mari
text: (She's so strong, cool, and calmー She's just amazing in every way!!!)
Mari stared at Kurenai in surprise and admiration after seeing her fight from up-close. Howeverー

name: Kurenai
text: Alright, no more distractions. It's time to put an end to this.
Kurenai once again pointed the tips of her swords towards the djinn.

name: Mari
text: (Th-That's right! Djinn-san isー)

name: Kurenai
text: "Book Djinn"ー If you're ready then this will be quick.

name: Kurenai
text: My client, that masked woman, is really impatient. So I'll sever your demonic power and seal you away here and nowー

name: Mari
text: P-Please wait, Kurenai-san!!!

name: Book Djinn
text: 『...Mari?』
Mari gathered all her courage and stood in front of Kurenai.

name: Kurenai
text: What is it?

name: Mari
text: U-Uhm... I don't think that Djinn-san is a bad person...

name: Kurenai
text: Not bad. Evil. It's a fact that his demonic power has caused misfortune for many.

name: Mari
text: Uuhh... th-that might be true, but...

name: Kurenai
text: Please get out of my way. The last thing I want is to hurt another Taimanin.
Kurenai tried to push Mari aside.

name: Mari
text: B-But even then, Kurenai-san...!!

name: Mari
text: Th-This person... he saved me!

name: Mari
text: When I screwed up and was in danger... he protected me with his own body... even though he was already hurt this bad...

name: Kurenai
text: The djinn... saved you...?
Kurenai curiously narrowed her eyes.

name: Mari
text: I-If... if he did something bad, then we can't help but seal him up...

name: Mari
text: But before that...!! I want to... repay Djinn-san for his kindness...

name: Kurenai
text: What? Repay him...?

name: Book Djinn
text: 『What is this...? This is the first time a human has said something like that to me.』
Kurenai and the Book Djinn both looked at Mari in confusion.

name: Book Djinn
text: 『...But Mari. You do not have to worry about me.』

name: Book Djinn
text: 『I've run from my fate and prolonged my pathetic life for a long time... but everything should have an end.』

name: Book Djinn
text: 『Even if she spared my life, I will soonー』

name: Mari
text: Th-That's...!
Mari cut the djinn off as if she didn't want him to finish his sentence.

name: Mari
text: That's all the more reason... you should have something to wish for... right?

name: Mari
text: All this time, you've been fulfilling people's wishes, haven't you...?

name: Mari
text: So isn't there something... you want to do, Djinn-san...?

name: Book Djinn
text: 『Something I want...?』
The djinn simply stared at Mari's face for a while, but eventuallyー
his lips appeared to find the words he had long held inside.
